original_comment: A very fine night-time urban image.  It comfortably satisfies the challenge topic, but that's almost irrelevant, given its many other qualities.  Conception, perspective, composition and execution are all first class.  The light on the pipes establishes a strange, artery-like, "living building" feel.  It's a 10 for me.
content: The artwork depicts a night-time urban scene, showcasing a unique perspective and composition.

original_comment: This shot gets better the more you look at it. sometimes its a shame that we have to have an ultimate "loser."
content: The photograph reveals layers of complexity that become more apparent upon prolonged observation.

original_comment: VEry good composition and sharpness!
content: The artwork displays a well-structured composition with clear organization of elements.

original_comment: i love the background color it really bring out the red in its neck. additionally i love the blur incorporated in the photo it really gives me the feeling that its such a fleeting moment. one of 2 10's i gave in this challenge. AMAZING job
content: The artwork features a prominent red neck against a vibrant background color, enhanced by a blur effect.

original_comment: The idea is good, it does a good job of identifying the title. The subject is not lit properly however, and it detracts from the photo quite a bit. Her entire face and arm are shadowed. I'd like to see this photo with some fill in flash. Don't be afraid to use flash outdoors, it will remove harsh shadows under the eyes, nose, lips and chin in mid day sun. It will also help in situations like this, where the sky is bright, but the subject itself looks as though they are in a shadow.
content: The photograph presents a subject whose features are poorly illuminated, leading to significant shadowing on the face and arm.

original_comment: A couple of suggestions I would have (if I may..) are try (in photoshop) to lower the saturation of the background a little. It's tad too red. Such lovely fish should stand out a lot more in the photo.
content: The artwork features a vibrant image of fish set against a predominantly red background.

original_comment: Why am I hearing the ghosts of the sea calling??? Great shot that meets the challenge 100% in my book. Well done!

If you could take this one again on a tripod with 100 ISO set and leave the shutter open much longer, I bet you could get a truly awesome photo from this very spot!  Good luck :)

original_comment: The fractal noise as fog layer is too obvious for my taste.  Look at any frame of the new Star Wars films and just marvel at how subtle the effects are.  Overall they add to a great illusion (too bad the actors forgot to act, but thats for another critique) but the effects are accomplished by many many very subtle layers, and by using truly organic elements (shooting real fog, real rust, etc) and layering them in there.
content: The use of fractal noise as a fog layer in the artwork is perceived as overly obvious.

original_comment: This is my favorite shot in the challenge.  In fact, I've stayed up late tonight to make sure you won a ribbon!  I've come back to it several times this week, and each time I'm even more impressed.  The slouch is perfect, the lighting is perfect, and so is everything else.  Good work, and congratulations on a wonderful image.
content: The artwork features a subject with a notable slouch, illuminated by ideal lighting, creating a striking visual impact.

original_comment: LOL they always are the best ones. I learned the hard way to always put the CF card back in the camera as soon as I finished transferring the photos off it. Headed across to Dargaville to take stock car photos, got there (hour travelling) and discovered the card was still on the kitchen table. Did have a tiny spare in the bag ..... it only held 28 photos!!
content: The commenter shares a humorous anecdote about forgetting to put the CF card back in the camera after transferring photos, resulting in a limited number of photos taken during a trip to Dargaville for stock car photography.

original_comment: I suspect that you may have been graded down by some for the infamous DNMC comment, but I disagree with that assessment - if in fact that was the reason for the 1 - 3 scores.  To me, this photo is a very creative and artistic expression of "desolation" - desolation of the soul.  I like the technical aspects of the image and the lighting.  I also like the positions of the actors in relation to each other.  While I suspect you just captured what was offered on set, I don't think you could do much better if you staged the shot yourself.  I was not able to vote in this challenge because of my trip, but I would have given it a 7 or possibly an 8.  I think it is well done...as do those who took the time to comment.
content: The photograph presents a scene that conveys a sense of desolation, featuring actors positioned in a way that enhances the emotional impact of the image.

original_comment: I like the idea of the shot and the lighting is great but I'm not sure that I can agree with whats been said about the expression. original_comment: Beautiful focus and detail. Well done!

original_comment: Wowsers. To me this is an incredibly awesome shot. Technically, focus and everything is great. The composition and the overall concept blows me away. Great title. I just really like this image. Wonderful job. thanks.

original_comment: Simply amazing. Great exposure and excellent job of capturing the moving water while balancing the exposure of the sky. Freakin awesome, perfect 10

original_comment: Good job exposing for this correctly to capture the detail quite nicely.  Sharp and well focused.  Usually this type of "seed" is photographed as a backlit subject to show off the fringe, although this works just fine as it is.  Good luck in the challenge.
content: The artwork effectively captures the detail of the seed with sharp focus and clarity.

original_comment: The colors, exposure, tones, and composition of elements really feels like a weathered Norman Rockwell's Saturday Evening Post magazine cover. Great eye to have spotted this story. The slump of the shoulders of the man with one leg is of weariness; tired...sadness. The crutches lay just in reach but he has set them aside to rest his weary body. The irony is that the sign behind him says "Play, because you can". There is no mirth in this man's posture. This is a highly emotional piece.
content: The artwork features a man with one leg, slumped shoulders, and crutches nearby, set against a backdrop with a sign that reads 'Play, because you can'. The colors, exposure, tones, and composition evoke a weathered Norman Rockwell's Saturday Evening Post magazine cover.

original_comment: Cool perspective and nice lighting.

original_comment: Our cameras are essential to our work, but they never get star billing; they are always working behind the scenes. It's time they got their moment in the limelight. Your challenge; use your camera to take a picture of itself.

original_comment: An extraordinary image. The sepia works a treat, and the composition is flawless.

It's ageless. . .the kind of photo that never grows old.   Sometimes after a photo's been in a frame for a while, and the child changes, you just get ready to replace it -- but this one -- it will be awesome forever!

original_comment: Nice catch!  I would have liked to have seen a tighter crop on the subject though.

original_comment: I'd say think about composition and maybe follow the "rule of thirds".  Also, you say you want if soft and while some may say this is cheating, if you capture the flower with focus tack sharp, you can always soften it in photoshop!  Might be a bit easier too!  Good luck.

original_comment: I've voted 100 images and I would say this is the best. The DOF is wide enough to get most of the leave in focus. And the composition is just great. This is simply a very beautiful shot.

original_comment: I'll start with the obvious - it is overtly sexual, which seems to have divided the voters. Your vote distribution curve being a clear indication that you have not been judged on art alone. That said the divide is not as stark as I would expect. You core composition is fantastic - it draws the eyes in and keeps them there, trying to work out exactly what is being seen. The direction of the edges of both the arms and the thighs seem to help this, and the slightest tint of light on the Martini glass provide just enough detail to keep it interesting. Well done.
content: The artwork is overtly sexual, eliciting a divided response from viewers, as indicated by the vote distribution curve.

original_comment: Using a smaller aperture might have improved this shot by allowing more of the flowers to be in focus.  If you're subject were a single flower (a flower singled out among others or just one lone flower) then a large aperture would help isolate the subject and minimize background and foreground distractions.  However, when shooting a group of flowers (especially seperate flowers in a group) it is better to use a smaller aperture to increase your depth of field to get more of them in focus.
content: The photograph features a group of flowers, but many are out of focus.

original_comment: My focus wants to go to the middle child.
content: The viewer's attention is drawn to the central figure in the artwork.

original_comment: awesome shot
content: The artwork features a striking photograph that captures a moment with clarity and precision.

original_comment: Interesting composition and great exposure, but I do not get the failure in this one.  I like the intentional tilt, as it really serves well to lead the viewer around the frame.
content: The artwork features an interesting composition with effective exposure and an intentional tilt.

original_comment: I think I like this one a little better than the one you posted in the forum.  The other one was a sweet capture of the little guy in action, but this one is a bit easier to look at because there is more focus and less blurry foreground.  I'd add a tad bit of sharpening, but probably only for the web, the photo is probably fine otherwise, especially for printing, again, you could probably bump your contrast just a little, but that's it, your colors are really nice and the composition is great
content: The artwork features a focused image with clear details and vibrant colors, showcasing a subject in a dynamic pose.

original_comment: I like this shot it is imaginitive and well thought out,The problem is the back ground is way overlit.It should be only 1 stop over. the lighting on the figure should be soft and shadowless. John Hedgecoe on pages138/39 of his book The Photographers handbook shows how, this is an excellent book on photography.I would like to see this done again and with a bit of soft focus thrown in. However since i'm a ood guy I dont vote down for the idea 8
content: The photograph is imaginative and well-composed, featuring a figure against a backdrop that is overly lit.

I like how the cookie shows some motion but the milk is sharp.
content: The artwork features a cookie in motion against a sharp background of milk, with noticeable compression artifacts in the background.

original_comment: The disturbing part of the image is the exceptionally noisy looking bacground items surrounding the noiseless smoke. It is so grainy that it actually is distracting to the image. There is some slight haloing around the singer but it is not terribly bad.

I don't think a viewer can be "bored" with this picture.  Well done.

original_comment: I think that in order for this photo to be taken to the next level, you'd have to spend a good bit of time thinking about composition.  Really think it through.  Where do you want your viewer's eye to start, where should the focal point be?  Think along the lines of the rule of thirds.  Draw the viewer's eye into the scene, and give it something (at a convenient location in the image) to rest on.  And always allow a bit of movement -- maybe a couple more string things placed a bit in the background completely out of the focal plane just adding a little bit...or think one single string...
content: The photograph lacks a clear and engaging composition, which affects the viewer's experience.

original_comment: this shot is too blurry...could be sharper...Just Kidding!!
content: The artwork presents an image that appears blurred, lacking sharpness.

original_comment: Terrific focus and lighting. Looks maybe just a tad underexposed though?

original_comment: (p.s. I would also try with less sharpening, as the current setting accentuate the fact that the focus is slightly too far out)
content: The artwork features a focus that appears slightly out of alignment.

original_comment: What did you do...upload all of these shots in June and then keep them hidden? I can't figure out any other reason for the lack of comments! I love the processing in this one. original_comment: Hang on, that's not Yorkshire!  Despite the inaccuracy of your title, I do like this - a wonderful sky.  I feel the composition would be strengthened with some foreground interest.

original_comment: Nice shot indeed! :)
content: The artwork features a well-composed photograph that captures a moment effectively.

original_comment: This is a good start to what I consider "product photography". Shiny metal is quite difficult to photograph in studio. Especially spoons. Let me try to critique this from a purely technical studio approach. The composition to me looks not very well thought out. The front edge ofthe spoon is barely visible. I would like to see the entire rim be lit. The business end of the spoon would be better if it were all in focus. I don't mind the handle fading out at all. The tone is good throughout, but the upper right edge is a bit distracting. It looks as though it is the edge of your backdrop.
content: The artwork features a spoon in a studio setting, showcasing shiny metal.

original_comment: Very artistic!  I like your choice of subject matter and it's a nice composition...maybe a third parsnip would be nice!
content: The artwork features a composition centered around parsnips, showcasing a thoughtful arrangement of the subject matter.

original_comment: Yea for us in Colorado.  Quite frankly, I was very much surprised how high my score stayed in this challenge. Interesting thing is that this was an off the cuff shot to just take a break from a lot of yard work and home remodeling stuff.

original_comment: wow, beautiful, this must have taken you forever!  I love it though and looks like the kind of thing I like to do, very nice detail and sharp focus

original_comment: Now back to the photo. I'd consider perhaps a closer view capturing the road in more detail in order to heighten the path of lines. If you were to crop the rightside so as to include the pillar on the right as opposed to center. And cropped out the tree on the left which just becomes distracting as it is half cut. This would provide a much stronger focus on the road.
content: The photograph features a road with a tree on the left and a pillar on the right.

content: The artwork features children as models against a white background, showcasing their poses and expressions.

original_comment: nice shot
content: The artwork captures a moment with clear focus and composition.

original_comment: Good composition and nice peaceful colors.  Could even be a bit tighter on the bird I think and keep the feel of this shot.  Lighting looks good and I love the ripples on the water.
content: The artwork features a composition with a bird and water, utilizing peaceful colors and effective lighting.

original_comment: Looks delicious! Nice choice of background color.
content: The artwork features a visually appealing subject that resembles food, complemented by a thoughtfully chosen background color.

original_comment: I sort of wish the crop was a little tighter around the bat just so we could see more of what was going on. Looks like a neat shot though.
content: The artwork features a bat in an intriguing composition.

original_comment: nice shot
content: The artwork features a well-composed photograph that captures a moment effectively.

original_comment: Wow! My favorite shot thus far. Varying sized water drops a definate plus. I like how the smallest drop doesn't align with the 3rd tree trunk. Colors are great.
content: The artwork features varying sizes of water drops, with a notable small drop that does not align with the third tree trunk. The colors used in the piece are vibrant.

original_comment: uninteresting scenery, dull sky, lacks of composition
content: The artwork depicts a landscape with a monotonous sky and unremarkable scenery.

original_comment: I've seen my share of this bridge. I really like this unique viewpoint. Really nicely shot :) (none voter)
content: The artwork features a bridge captured from a unique viewpoint.

original_comment: The bread's washed out, though, and the jars in the background are a little too blurry.  Try narrowing your aperture a bit - it'll help with both problems
content: The artwork features a depiction of bread in the foreground with jars in the background.

original_comment: A nice combination of high-key and soft focus. For my personal taste I would perhaps have preferred her hair to stay in focus - but you know what - it's still a cracking shot.
content: The artwork features a combination of high-key lighting and a soft focus effect.

original_comment: The model looks like she wishes to be anywhere else but in front of that lens (no offense to the model). The lightinging has no warmth and is a little to bright. The tacks, which should be the main subject are overpowered by the "you know what" and are out of focus.
content: The model appears disengaged, conveying a sense of discomfort in front of the camera. The lighting is overly bright and lacks warmth, while the tacks, intended as the focal point, are overshadowed and out of focus.

original_comment: Great picture! I love the perspective that you used! Top 5!
content: The artwork features a unique perspective that draws the viewer's attention.

original_comment: nice shot but i don't like the light poles coming out of their head
content: The artwork features a striking image that captures a moment effectively.

original_comment: I wonder if a little less depth of focus would have brought out your main subject more, I like the idea behind this image though.
content: The artwork features a main subject that is somewhat obscured by depth of focus.

original_comment: a better focal point before taking the shot might have worked better
content: The comment suggests that the photograph lacks a strong focal point.

original_comment: Overall, great photo.  What caught my attention:  the real shutters on the windows.  I'm nutty that way. I like the overall composition and how you got the sun to cooperate.
content: The photograph features real shutters on the windows, contributing to its composition.

original_comment: good action shot -- the composition really works well in this shot.
content: The artwork presents a dynamic moment captured in an action shot, showcasing movement and energy.

original_comment: Good composition for a narrow frame like this.  The play of light and shadow is interesting too.
content: The artwork features a narrow frame with a well-balanced composition.

original_comment: This is an interesting composition, which shows off the architectural detail very well.  You probably had no choice but to crop at this point anyway, but it's effective.  I'd have tried a tiny bit more contrast, to better define the depth of the scene (it seems a little two-dimensional), but maybe you did try that & preferred it this way?  6.
content: The artwork features an intriguing composition that highlights architectural details effectively.

original_comment: I believe your focus is on the swans however I feel this is a shot that would benefit from having everything in focus.
content: The artwork features swans as the main subject.

original_comment: Very pleasing and wonderful color.  The focus is perfectly on the important feature (eyelashes).  Lighting and exposure are perfect.  Wonderful image, Congratulations on a nice work of art!
content: The artwork features vibrant colors, with a strong emphasis on the eyelashes as the focal point. The lighting and exposure are well-executed.

original_comment: Composition: 4, A centered subject is usually the most static.  You might try moving it off to the side and then tilting the image to add energy to the subject.  Also, the twig on the right does nothing to add to the composition, it merely distracts.
content: The artwork features a centered subject with a twig on the right.

original_comment: Background has been put out of focus successfully, but is still too distracting. Man's skin tone seems a bit gray. Composition doesn't quite work for me.
content: The background is out of focus but remains distracting. The man's skin tone appears gray. The overall composition is unappealing.

original_comment: great tones and perspective here. -9-
content: The artwork features a range of tones and a strong sense of perspective.

original_comment: I think this shot would be better without the border. The flower have some parts out of focus and the background is too dark, which is really not cool for bokeh. The left part has almost a good bokeh, but i think you lost a lot with the dark parts.
content: The photograph features a flower with a border, some parts out of focus, and a dark background.

original_comment: neat looking shot here. i love the colors on here, really makes the oldness come out
content: The artwork features a visually appealing composition with a focus on color.

original_comment: I might have liked a slightly different angle so more of the space between steps could be seen, but I do like the contrast between the stairs and the sky (more than one shot with this contrast this time around).  Since a lot of the railing is showing more of the highlights like in the middle would have been nicer.  Nice shot overall.
content: The artwork features a staircase with a contrasting sky in the background. The composition includes visible railings, particularly highlighting the middle section.

original_comment: great shot I just dont see the leading lines.
content: The artwork is a photograph that captures a moment effectively.

original_comment: Nice composition
content: The artwork features a balanced arrangement of elements, creating a visually appealing layout.

original_comment: I was actually trying to make something which would work as a neutral-density filter. I figured I could focus the camera on the distant subject, and that the dots/lines in the filter would be so OOF that they'd disappear -- there's been a recent discussion of this effect in a thread about shooting animals through cage bars. Obviously, it only partially works.
content: The artwork attempts to function as a neutral-density filter, designed to allow the camera to focus on distant subjects while rendering the dots and lines in the foreground out of focus.

original_comment: great shot but why the sephia? would have looked nicer in color.
content: The artwork features a photograph that has been edited to appear in sepia tones.

original_comment: Impressive! Best bug shot I've seen so far in this challenge. Lovely clarity.
content: The artwork features a macro photograph of a bug, showcasing intricate details and sharp focus.

original_comment: I like this shot. good the composition and the light. a bit of overexposition on the right for a better dramatical effect. very good.
content: The photograph features a strong composition with effective use of light.

original_comment: Wow, what a brilliant photo. Dam.. If I took that photo I'd freak out though.. that white tent in the background is annoying :P. Though, not everyones a perfectionist. Good work.
content: The photograph features a striking composition that captivates the viewer's attention.

original_comment: That sky is absolutely gorgeous. I think this was an especially challenging challenge. I believe it fits the challenge well. Overall this shot is good. I like the story I get from it. Not sure how this could be improved, IMO... 8
content: The artwork features a stunning sky, capturing vibrant colors and dynamic cloud formations.

original_comment: Afraid to say the challenge said no motion trails.  Good shot otherwise.  7
content: The artwork features a still image that captures a moment without motion trails.
